tdgame.controller

Class CellContainerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tdgame.controller.CellContainerController

  • public class CellContainerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is controller class for Grid Cell Container.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CellContainerController(CellContainerView ccView, CellContainerModel ccModel)
      This method will initialize and bind View and model of Grid Cell Container moduel.
